org.shortbrain.vaadin.container

Class HierarchicalBeanContainerFactory<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shortbrain.vaadin.container.HierarchicalBeanContainerFactory<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    IDTYPE - The type of the item identifier
    BEANTYPE - The type of the Bean
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainerFactory<BEANTYPE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractHierarchicalBeanContainerFactory

    public abstract class HierarchicalBeanContainerFactory<IDTYPE,BEANTYPE>
extends Object
implements IContainerFactory<BEANTYPE>
    ContainerFactory abstract class that define methods to facilitate the creation of Containers from a list of objects using different algorithms. This Factory returns Container that are AbstractBeanContainer implementation.
    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Vincent Demeester
    See Also:
    ContainerFactory, BeanContainer, AbstractBeanContainer

        public abstract com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromCollection(com.vaadin.data.Container container,
                                                   Collection<BEANTYPE> beans)
        Return a container of type BEAN from a collection of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        container - container to be populated.
        beans - collection of beans.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.

        public abstract com.vaadin.data.Container getContainerFromCollection(com.vaadin.data.Container container,
                                                   Collection<BEANTYPE> beans,
                                                   Class<? extends com.vaadin.data.Container> containerClass)
        Return a container of type BEAN from a collection of BEAN objects. It will update the given container if no null. The returned container will be of the given type (containerClass).
        Specified by:
        getContainerFromCollection in interface IContainerFactory<BEANTYPE>
        Parameters:
        container - container to be populated.
        beans - collection of beans.
        containerClass - type of the container to return.
        Returns:
        a container of Beans.
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • getByAnnotation

        public static final <I,T,A extends Enum> HierarchicalBeanContainerFactory<I,T> getByAnnotation(Class<? super T> beanClass,
                                                                         A containerType)
        Create a BeanContainerFactory of type T and idtype I using a default AnnotationReaderAlgorithm and the propertyId bean id resolver. It uses BeanItemContainer implementation by default.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - type of the container.
        containerType - type of container (used by AnnotationReaderAlgorithm)
        Returns:
        a BeanContainerFactory.
        Since:
        0.2.0
        See Also:
        HierarchicalBeanContainerFactory#getByAlgorithm(Class, PropertyReaderAlgorithm, Class, HierarchicalBeanBuilder, BeanIdResolver)

        Create a BeanContainerFactory of type T and idtype I using a default AnnotationReaderAlgorithm and the propertyId bean id resolver. It uses BeanItemContainer implementation by default.
        Parameters:

        containerType - type of container (used by AnnotationReaderAlgorithm)

        Create a BeanContainerFactory of type T and idtype I using a default AnnotationReaderAlgorithm and the propertyId bean id resolver. It uses BeanContainer implemantation by default.

        beanContainerType - the type of AbstractBeanContainer to use.
        beanBuilder - the hierarchical beanBuilder to use to build a Container.Hierarchical
        propertyId - the identifier of the property to use to find item identifiers.
        Returns:
        a BeanContainerFactory.
        Since:
        0.2.0
        See Also:
        HierarchicalBeanContainerFactory#getByAlgorithm(Class, PropertyReaderAlgorithm, Class, HierarchicalBeanBuilder, BeanIdResolver)
